pattern_edit_screen.title: Edit Pattern
patternlist.title: Patterns
pattern_edit_screen.info:
Determine the pattern for removal of pixels from the heart!

Pixels get removed from the heart in order from 1-81.

§9Right-Click§f an empty pixel to assign it to the §lhighest unused value§r§f, or to remove the value of a valued one.

Hover over a pixel and §ltype a number§r§f to assign it to that value.

Two pixels with the same value will remove at the same time.
Unassigned pixels will remove when the heart empties.
Skipped values cause periods where no pixels are removed
